resources.string: You need to set the permission to allow "Show Hover Window", otherwise you will not be able to use the Account Center function
Are you sure you dont want to use the Account Center feature? Without the hover window you will not be able to switch accounts and other operations!
Please go to Settings Permissions Management to allow hover windows to be displayed！
Media access needs to be enabled to use this feature
Camera permissions need to be enabled to use this feature
Please go to "Settings-Privilege Management" to enable media access permissions
Please go to "Settings-Privilege Management" to enable camera permissions
